name: Legacy of Evil
description:
A macabre adventure inside an abandoned kindergarten, revolving around urban legends, about a demon that haunts the kindergarten.

In this graphically accurate and somewhat disturbing adventure, the tension will be through the roof.

Features:
  • Spooky atmosphere
  • A disturbing story
  • A large, graphically cool map
  • Dubbed gameplay
  • Several jumpscare
Key Configuration
  • H - Pause Menu (in game)
  • WASD - Walk
  • E - Interact
  • Left Shift - Run
System Compatibility

The game is compatible with Windows, Linux, Mac os. There are several graphics options in the game settings, the default is ultra.

Puzzle Solutions

The game is designed to create tension in the player; inside there are several puzzles to solve. After about 2-3 minutes from the start of a puzzle, a hint is shown in the upper right corner, which can help you better understand what to do, if that is not enough: the solutions are in the video below.
